notes: Baselines are conservative (D/C level) - honest about current state
Goal is to track improvement over time, not enforce unrealistic standards
Raise baselines after 3 consecutive runs above current baseline

UI scenarios (is_ui_scenario: true) are scored out of 11 (includes design_system criterion)
Standard scenarios are scored out of 10
